title: The Making of Stand By Me with Screenwriters Bruce A. Evans and Raynold Gideon
itunes:title: The Making of Stand By Me with Screenwriters Bruce A. Evans and Raynold Gideon
itunes:subtitle: We're not finished in Castle Rock. Stand By Me screenwriters Bruce A. Evans and Raynold Gideon join the Losers to discuss how they brought Stephen King's "The Body" to life. Together, they revisit how they escaped development hell, ...
description:
We're not finished in Castle Rock. Stand By Me screenwriters Bruce A. Evans and Raynold Gideon join the Losers to discuss how they brought Stephen King's "The Body" to life. Together, they revisit how they escaped development hell, navigated all the hurdles of post-production, and won the heart of Stephen King. They also share their can't-miss story on drinking with King following their preview screening. It's an incredible chat and one that truly celebrates the 35th anniversary of Rob Reiner's coming-of-age masterpiece.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
